item.title: A Story about Prosper Online Loan Business using Tableau
item.description: Project Links GitHub Links Tableau Public Workbooks: Story First Version: Click Here Story Final Version: Click Here Summary Personal online loan business has been an important way for borrowers to raise money and for investors to earn interest. However, the risk of this type of investment is definitely higher than T-bills, T-notes and T-bonds, so it’s important to address the default risk for this business.
